email_hint_text: [CY] This must be the email address they use for their Companies House account. If they do not have a Companies House account, they must create one before you can add them.
errors_email_invalid: [CY] Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com
inset_all_users_who: [CY] All users who are added to this account will be able to:
inset_bullet_1_view_users: [CY] view users who have been added to this account
inset_bullet_2_verify_people: [CY] verify people's identity for Companies House from XX DATE
inset_bullet_3_file_as_an_authorised_age: [CY] file as an authorised agent from XX DATE
option_2_hint_p: [CY] They will be able to add and remove:
option_3_hint: [CY] They'll be able to view all users who have been added to this account. They will not be able to add or remove users.
